lead_paragraph: BAER--Lt. Col. Leo, USAR (Retired). Born Numbrecht, Germany, January 24, 1918, passed away March 29 at his home in New York. Married happily for 66 years to Lore, nee Lebrecht. Survived by Hannah and Ed Baer, Anne and Lennard Loewentritt, and many adoring great-nieces and nephews, and friends. Service at noon on March 31 at Riverside Memorial Chapel, followed by interment in Cedar Park Cemetery. No shiva, but please gather at Congregation Habonim at 103 West End Ave between 6-8pm. Service at 6:30pm. 1/3
